quote: Marriage is nothing but a commitment to care and share.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Marriage is the death of hope.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: On marriage: You sort of stumble along and reconnect and lose each other and reconnect again.
author: Felicity Huffman

quote: A wedding is and event, but marriage is a life.
author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating

quote: When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Happy wife, happy life.
author: Paul Orfalea,  Copy This!: Lessons from a Hyperactive Dyslexic who Turned a Bright Idea Into One of America's Best Companies

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quote: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: In marriage, each partner is to be an encourager rather than a critic; a forgiver rather than a collector of hurts; an enabler rather than a reformer.
author: H. Norman Wright

quote: Maybe marriage, like life, isn't only about the big moments, whether they be good or bad. Maybe it's all the small things—like being guided slowly forward, surely, day after day—that stretches out to strengthen even the most tenuous bond.
author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby

quote: Marriage becomes hard work once you have poured the entirety of your life’s expectations for happiness into the hands of one mere person. Keeping that going is hard work.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
author: Jane Harrison

quote: Love of music, of sunsets and sea; a liking for the same kind of people; political opinions that are not radically divergent; a similar stance as we look at the stars and think of the marvelous strangeness of the universe - these are what build a marriage. And it is never to be taken for granted.
author: Madeleine L'Engle,  Two-Part Invention: The Story of a Marriage

quote: Marriage is a partnership, not a democracy.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Best of Me

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times -- always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the wedding cup, whenever you're wrong, admit it; whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: [Marriage] happens as with cages: the birds without despair to get in, and those within despair of getting out.
author: Michel de Montaigne,  The Complete Essays

quote: Marriage isn't about Winning - It's about Lasting
author: Mark Gorman

quote: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.
author: Dan Marino

quote: Marriage is the union of two 'I's to form a 'V'. Both 'I's have to tilt equally to make a good 'V'. 'I's standing tall can never make a 'V'.
author: Ashok Kallarakkal

quote: That there's no more important decision in life than who you marry.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Marriage can wait, education cannot.
author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns

quote: There can be no disparity in marriage like unsuitability of mind and purpose.
author: Charles Dickens,  David Copperfield

quote: Marriage [10w] The only thing better than forgiveness in marriage is forgetfulness.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I think of how each person in a marriage owes it to the other to find individual happiness, even in a shared life. That this is the only way to grow together, instead of apart.
author: Emily Giffin,  Heart of the Matter

quote: You know that we've got a few problems we need to talk through before we get married.""I'm not getting rid of Pooh.""See, there you go being antagonistic. Marriage means learning to compromise.""I didn't say I wouldn't compromise. I promise to take the ribbon out of her topknot before you walk her.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips,  It Had to Be You

quote: The snag about marriage is, it isn´t worth the divorce.
author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce

quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Marriage is not a process for prolonging the life of love, sir. It merely mummifies its corpse.
author: P.G. Wodehouse,  The Small Bachelor

quote: Till Death Do You Part [10w] Marriage will indeed change people ~for better or for worse.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: To fall in love with someone's thoughts - the most intimate, splendid romance.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Through devotion, your family cares become more peaceful, mutual love between husband and wife becomes more sincere, the service we owe to the prince more faithful, and our work, no matter what it is, becomes more pleasant and agreeable.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: A love story in six words: Hello. Goodbye. In between was marriage.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: A happy wife is a happy life.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: Getting married is like trading in the adoration of many for the sarcasm of one.
author: Mae West

quote: One should always be in love. That's the reason one should never marry.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Who, Me? We marry nearly the same person over and over again,hoping next time they'll get it right.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quote: The biggest cause of divorse in my opinion is marriage
author: Paul V. Walters

quote: Husband: a man with hopes of being a lover who settles for being a provider, causing his wife to grow suspicious of her depleting jewelry box.
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation, and conversation must have a common basis, and between two people of widely different culture the only common basis possible is the lowest level.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Soulmate My Ass [10w] Aspire to marry the person the least wrong for you.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Love vs. Honeymoon [10w] Love is what truly begins when the honeymoon is over.
author: Beryl Dov
